Pattern-weave coat with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front and front pockets. Adjustable tab with press-studs at the cuffs, and a pleat at the back. Unlined.

Coat in an Italian wool blend with a stand-up collar and concealed press-studs at the front. Detachable tie belt at the waist, pockets in the side seams and one inner pocket. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled.
Short coat in woven fabric with a zip down the front, patch front pockets, shoulder pads, and a pleat at the back. Lined.

Leggings in ribbed organic cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Leggings in ribbed organic cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.

Dungarees in superstretch denim with press-studs at the sides and adjustable straps with press-studs at the front. Chest pocket, back pockets, fake front pockets and a fake fly. Concealed press-studs at the crotch in sizes 4-12M.
Long jacket in jacquard-patterned jersey with narrow notch lapels and front pockets. Unlined.

Off-the-shoulder jumper in a rib knit containing some wool with a double layer at the top and long sleeves.
Top in an airy weave with spaghetti shoulder straps, a lace-trimmed V-neck and buttons at the top. Seam with a flounce at the hem.

Cold shoulder top in woven fabric with narrow shoulder straps and a wide flounce at the neckline that continues down the sleeves.

Double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a gently tapered waist, open front pockets and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Double-breasted coat in a wool weave. Collar with a hook-and-eye fastening and shoulder tabs with a button, a loose yoke front and back, flap side pockets with a button and one inner pocket. Detachable, adjustable tie belt at the waist with a covered metal buckle, an adjustable tab with a covered metal buckle at the cuffs and a pleat at the hem with a concealed tab and button. Lined.
Bomber jacket in woven fabric with reversible sequin appliqués, a small, ribbed stand-up collar and a zip down the front. Welt side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Padded gilet with imitation leather details, a stand-up collar and detachable hood. Zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets with a press-stud. Lined.
Padded gilet with imitation leather details, a stand-up collar and detachable hood. Zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets with a press-stud. Lined.
Padded gilet with imitation leather details, a stand-up collar and detachable hood. Zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets with a press-stud. Lined.
Single-breasted jacket in sturdy jersey made from a viscose blend with notch lapels, a button at the front and patch front pockets. Partly lined.
Jumper in soft, rib-knit, textured cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in soft, rib-knit, textured cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless Christmas tree dress in cotton jersey with tiered organza flounces and sewn-on pompoms.

Dungarees in washed stretch denim with adjustable straps with press-studs. Seam at the waist with press-studs at the sides, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (size 1-2Y without press-studs), and elasticated hems.
